update.description:
This is mostly just deleting dead code, removing unused/broken files,  and following ROS conventions. Note some of the file moves are  appearing on Bitbucket as remove \+ add even though they were moved with  hg move.

* Delete unused blender param files
* Delete unused/broken launch files in wamv\_description
* Delete dead code /references to old repositories this code was imported from
* Remove sensor joints from wamv\_base \(wamv\_base should just be the wamv IMO\)
* Move python nodes to nodes dir
* Use xacro for world files to eliminate duplicate code
* Move wamv\_robotx to robotx\_gazebo to remove circular dependency
* Remove platform specific features from wamv base
* Get model for quat2rpy by model name, not arbitrary index
* Give buoys names so duplicates can exist
* Build xacro files as install targets

‌
update.title: Various cleanups / refactors

content.raw: Looks good to me. Thanks for the cleaning!
content.html: Looks good to me. Thanks for the cleaning!

content.raw: I don't think we need `hector_gazebo_plugins` for now. We should also remove it from `package.xml`. We might need it when adding sensors but I’d remove it for now.
content.html: I don't think we need hector_gazebo_plugins for now. We should also remove it from package.xml. We might need it when adding sensors but I’d remove it for now.

content.raw:
This is great.  Wonderful to do some spring cleaning. Thank you.

We might also have some large preliminary \(no defunct\) meshes of the wamv in the history that bloat the repos.
content.html:
This is great. Wonderful to do some spring cleaning. Thank you.

We might also have some large preliminary (no defunct) meshes of the wamv in the history that bloat the repos.

content.raw: Confirmed, it’s running for me too.
I wonder if we should remove all files under `models/sandisland` except `model.config`, `model.sdf` and `sandisland2.png.`
content.html: I wonder if we should remove all files under models/sandisland except model.config, model.sdf and sandisland2.png.

content.raw:
I’ll go ahead and remove them in this PR then.  I think we should also remove:

* The development screenshots/GIMP file in robotx\_gazebo/models/sandisland \(besides the actual heightmap\)
* robotx\_gazebo/test \(We should add proper tests later, but these seem to just be development work\)
* The .blend files for the buoys \(blender can work directly with .dae, which is what is used in the model\)

‌
content.html:
I’ll go ahead and remove them in this PR then. I think we should also remove:

  • The development screenshots/GIMP file in robotx_gazebo/models/sandisland (besides the actual heightmap)
  • robotx_gazebo/test (We should add proper tests later, but these seem to just be development work)
  • The .blend files for the buoys (blender can work directly with .dae, which is what is used in the model)

‌

content.raw: I agree.  Those bits and pieces are left over from development.
content.html: I agree. Those bits and pieces are left over from development.

content.raw: I got it running. After running sandisland.launch run usv\_diffdrive.launch. The left stick Y axis controls the left motor and visa versa for the right stick
content.html: I got it running. After running sandisland.launch run usv_diffdrive.launch. The left stick Y axis controls the left motor and visa versa for the right stick
